meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he skateboarded at the park.
meanings.sent2: She skateboarded down the street with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat skateboarded across the room on a tiny board.
meanings.sent4: His ideas skateboarded through his mind, each one more exciting than the last.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wheels on pavement echoed as he skateboarded into the sunset.

meanings.definition: Engaged in the activity of riding a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: The skateboarded kids were having fun at the skate park.
meanings.sent2: She watched the skateboarded boy perform tricks at the competition.
meanings.sent3: The skateboarded dog rolled around the yard on a mini board.
meanings.sent4: Her skateboarded spirit soared as she glided through the air.
meanings.sent5: The skateboarded crowd cheered as the skater landed a perfect trick.
